div.p: The Communication and CommunicationNotDone profiles represent the positive and negative statements for a communication event.

td.a: Negation Example using a single coded concept

tr.td: Communication of finding of Macular Edema absent not done because patient moved away.

div.p: This example meets measure intent for exclusion as defined in the following example CQL:

pre.code: [CommunicationNotDone: "Macular edema absent (finding)"] MacularEdemaAbsentNotCommunicated with "Diabetic Retinopathy Encounter" EncounterDiabeticRetinopathy such that MacularEdemaAbsentNotCommunicated.sent during EncounterDiabeticRetinopathy.period and ( MacularEdemaAbsentNotCommunicated.statusReason in "Medical Reason" or MacularEdemaAbsentNotCommunicated.statusReason in "Patient Reason" )

div.p: For a more complete discussion of representation of negation within QICore and quality improvement artifacts, see the Negation in QI Core topic.
